text: Earl Godfrey (born 20 August 1961) is a Bermudian former cyclist. He competed in the individual road race event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Bermudian male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Bermuda Category:Cyclists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Earl Godfrey
